## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                               |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------- |
| `color`  | `color`   |             | `"accent" \| "light" \| "primary"` |
| `shape`  | `shape`   |             | `"round" \| "square"`              |
| `size`   | `size`    |             | `"default" \| "large" \| "small"`  |
| `type`   | `type`    |             | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`  |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                     | Description                             |
| ------------------------ | --------------------------------------- |
| `--background`           | Background of the button                |
| `--background-activated` | Background of the button when activated |
| `--background-focused`   | Background of the button when focused   |
